Package atg.epub.pws.taglib

Provides the implementation of the "PWS" tag library for ATG Content Administration (formerly known as Publishing).

See:
          Description

Class Summary
CreateVersionManagerURITag Tag for generating a version manager uri string for repository or file assets
CreateVersionManagerURITag.TEI TagExtraInfo class to handle var/id processing.
EscapeHTMLTextTag Support for HTML escaping and truncating text
EscapeHTMLTextTag.TEI TagExtraInfo class to handle var/id processing.
GetAssetTag Tag for obtaining an asset given a URI string or a working version given a URI and a workspace name.
GetAssetTag.TEI TagExtraInfo class to handle var/id processing.
GetAssignableUsersTag Tag for returning a set of users that can be assigned to a workflow task.
GetAssignableUsersTag.TEI TagExtraInfo class to handle var/id processing.
GetProjectsTag Tag for returning all the projects with the given status.
GetProjectsTag.TEI TagExtraInfo class to handle var/id processing.
GetProjectTag Tag for returning a project
GetProjectTag.TEI TagExtraInfo class to handle var/id processing.
GetTasksTag Tag for obtaining a list of tasks from the workflow engine.
GetTasksTag.TEI TagExtraInfo class to handle var/id processing.
GetUnsuppliedAssetsTag Tag for obtaining the names and counts of all and required asset placeholders in the workflow for the given project.
GetUnsuppliedAssetsTag.TEI TagExtraInfo class to handle var/id processing.
GetVersionedAssetTypesTag Tag for obtaining a list of all versioned asset types, including file types.
GetVersionedAssetTypesTag.TEI TagExtraInfo class to handle var/id processing.
GetWorkflowDefinitionsTag Tag for obtaining a list of workflow definitions from the workflow manager.
GetWorkflowDefinitionsTag.TEI TagExtraInfo class to handle var/id processing.
GetWorkflowDescriptorTag Tag for obtaining a workflow descriptor object for a given workflow.
GetWorkflowDescriptorTag.TEI TagExtraInfo class to handle var/id processing.
 

Package atg.epub.pws.taglib Description

Provides the implementation of the "PWS" tag library for ATG Content Administration (formerly known as Publishing).
